items.name: ah.6.1..1
items.description: Describe how the American Indian nations of the Southwest, including the Hopi, Havasupai, and Navajo, adapted to and modified their environment.

extensions.note: This is a note about the standard.

items.name: ah.6.1..2
items.description: Explain how the arrival of the Spanish in the 1500s affected the American Indian nations of the Southwest.

extensions.note: This is a note about the standard.

items.name: ah.6.1..3
items.description: Describe the impact of Spanish colonization on the culture and economy of the American Indian nations of the Southwest.

extensions.note: This is a note about the standard.
